channel.title: cabbage on Luke's Cookbook
channel.description: Recent content in cabbage on Luke's Cookbook

item.title: Cabbage Tarte Tatin
item.description: Ingredients Ingredient Subheading 1/2 recipe Buttery, Flaky Pie Dough or store-bought dough (see note) 1/2 cup granulated sugar (4 ounces; 113g) 6 tablespoons white balsamic vinegar (3 ounces; 90ml), divided 2 tablespoons unsalted butter (1 ounce; 28g) 1 tablespoon (15ml) Dijon mustard 2 teaspoons chopped fresh thyme leaves, plus more for garnish 1 1/2 teaspoons (5g) Diamond Crystal kosher salt; for table salt, use half as much by volume or the same weight 1/4 teaspoon freshly ground black pepper 1 small green cabbage head (2 to 3 pounds; 908 to1.

item.title: Crack Slaw
item.description: Ingredients 2 tablespoons toasted sesame oil 3 cloves garlic, minced 1/2 cup onion, diced 5 green onions, sliced on a bias (white and green parts) 1 pound ground pork 1/2 teaspoon ground ginger sea salt and black pepper, to taste 1 tablespoon Sriracha or garlic chili sauce, more to taste 14 ounce bag coleslaw mix (green cabbage, red cabbage and carrots) 3 tablespoons soy sauce 1 tablespoon unseasoned rice vinegar 2 tablespoons toasted sesame seeds Directions Heat the sesame oil in a large skillet over medium high heat.
